function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of viruses through touch surfaces and shared spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Implement touchless technologies, outdoor and common space access, and maintain social distance","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, outdoor space design, and social distancing measures","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building management and administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to virus propagation","Impact":"Spread of viruses through wastewater","Mitigation":"Proper sealing of pipes, separation of greywater, and development of separate infected person toilets","Technologies":"Wastewater sealing and separation systems, and dedicated infected person toilets","People":"Household residents","Owner":"Household occupants and administration"},{"Description":"Inefficient energy use and lack of backup energy sources","Impact":"Disruption of energy supply during pandemics","Mitigation":"Develop backup energy sources, promote sustainable energy, and use energy-efficient appliances","Technologies":"Backup energy systems, sustainable energy sources, and energy-efficient appliances","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management and administrators"}]}
